casebody.data:
PRODUCTION SYSTEMS, INC.
v.
AMERISURE INSURANCE COMPANY and Union Insurance Company a/k/a the Chesapeake Bay Property & Casualty Insurance Company. No. 83P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Scott Wyatt, Stanley F. Hammer, High Point, for Production Systems, Inc. Kenneth R. Keller, Greensboro, for Amerisure Insurance Company. Susan L. Hofer, Charlotte, for Union Insurance Company.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of February 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
